website_summaries.verdict: Convenient size of fireproof bag that will collapse down to a flat shape when needed.
pros: Materials are resistant to water damage and fire up to 1,832°F
This bag works especially well for letter sized documents and cash, but it can hold thumb drives, photos, and certificates too
Can be folded to fit easily in a small safe
cons: With measurements of 13.4" x 9.4", it's a little smaller than some others

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with product size, Water resistant material,
customer_reviews.text: So far so good what I like about these are they are a great dimension for a full-size document not legal documents but full-size great for storage for documents that need to be safe and secure able to label each zipper pocket to keep things in order water Resistance not waterproof because waterproof would enable them to be submerged I can’t see that happening with the zipper but not willing to try
customer_reviews.author: CTR

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a glove in my small 2 drawer filing cabnet!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It fits perfectly in my small 2 drawer filing cabinet. I returned my other one from another seller that was to big and bulky to fit. And for anyone wondering this one is very flexible to fit in smaller spaces. That was my main concern i needed it to fit in my filing cabinet and it fits like a glove. I'm so happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and helpful product
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to hold some very important legal documentations. The size is good for most of the documents and the quality of the product meets the expectation as well. Very helpful product if you want to keep some paper document in a safe place.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy built for a document bag
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bag for my travel documents. Upon receiving this bag, I was not disappointed. The zipper is easier to use and the size of it is perfect for my letter size documents. Exterior feels similar to leather but it is not leather. Gonna use it for another week to update the review. But now, I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: A Good Product Functions as It Claimed
customer_reviews.text: I always want to have a doc bag to keep the high security need document. This product came to my mind at the moment. The tried using fire to burn it, Nada, doesnt really ignite at all ;) it defintely give me peace of mind, recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Felix

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag as insurance for some of my important documents and items. It measures 13”x9.5” which is big enough for a decent amount of valuables. I’m a proponent for buying things before you need them and I hope I never need to test out this bag for real.
customer_reviews.author: JohnnyZ

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: This is well made. I tried it out with water and it is not water proof as water will come in through the zipper if submerged, but if water is splashed in it, it will keep the inside contents dry. Don’t know if it is fireproof but is a nice place to keep things like a portable hard drive, especially if traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi

customer_reviews.title: A Nice flexible storage for important documents
customer_reviews.text: Good size, flexible. lots of room, for passports. currency etc.. Able to be taken in luggage, and back pack if desired. Good purchase/ If not full one can bend it in half..unlike others. Soft material.
customer_reviews.author: John A. Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work as described
customer_reviews.text: I have some important papers/documents in it now. I think I will try testing all the features with something less valuable in it in the near future. I do not know how water resistant it is as it has a regular zipper on it. I have water resistant jackets that have a far better zipper that provide that feature.
customer_reviews.author: Paul P

customer_reviews.title: water resistant and fire proof for important docs
customer_reviews.text: Good product. I was looking for a folder like this for long. It is water resistant and fire proof with a zip. this folder looks even nicer than I thought. Good size to out different docs like passport or contract. it's time to move all from my plastic folder to this one !!!
customer_reviews.author: OkOk

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I tested it with a normal Bic lighter. In less than 30 seconds a mark formed on the outside of the bag, & the inside the bag started to melt. The paper I had in there was already getting hot. Also the zipper doesn’t close all the way. This would never protect item from a fire or flood.
customer_reviews.author: photogirl

customer_reviews.title: Huge Fail
customer_reviews.text: Warning. This product failed to protect valuables/documents in several online (video recorded) tests. Unfortunately, I found this out after purchasing... Don’t make the same mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: Fake reviews this thing is a joke
customer_reviews.text: Must be fake reviews no way this is water proof doubt the fire proof too it has a small thin rubber layer on the outside and the inside lining is like a winter coat lining very disappointed with product. Nothing like expected
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Waterproof or Water Resistant
customer_reviews.text: In the product name it says waterproof but in the description it says water resistant. This bag is absolutely not waterproof, and I’m not even sure I would call it water resistant. Some water does roll off of it, but I ran it under the kitchen sink for about 20 seconds and the inside was very damp. I can’t imagine it would keep any documents from getting wet and may actually hold the water. I would advise against buying this if you want something waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hurst

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof or fireproof.
customer_reviews.text: The zipper does not close all the way, so any water would very obviously seep through. In the event of a fire, your documents would almost certainly burn as well.
customer_reviews.author: Emilio

customer_reviews.title: Almost a scam but just really poorly built.
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t fireproof nor is it water resistant. The zipper has a hole that would allow any water or heat through. It’s a bag, so if you need a bag, it does that. If you want fireproofing or anything water resistant then look for another product that doesn’t try to sell itself as something it’s not.
customer_reviews.author: Julian Goldblatt

customer_reviews.title: Zipper leaves a gap opening of approximately 3/16 of an inch open to water & fire
customer_reviews.text: How can this possibly be water resistant when it won’t even zip all the way closed?? Ripoff. It may be fireproof, why is that not a question here? But how can THAT be if it does not zip all the way shut? The zipper leaves it open almost a quarter of an inch, just over an eighth of an inch. Would NOT trust this on either counts of “water resistant” nor “fire proof”, unless it’s inside a water resistant & fire proof safe.
customer_reviews.author: DianeMarie

customer_reviews.title: Not fireproof and not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I tested the product with a candle and the stitches burned and came right away. I placed it in a water bucket and found water was leaked inside. With high temperature the inside Got so hot I don’t think it can handle documents or sensitive objects.
customer_reviews.author: Jags

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I needed this because our safe doesn’t currently work, and I got this to hide. I needed to keep my BC, SSC, and expensive jewelry in. Defiantly has some kind of protective coating. It can get scratched. It holds a lot, more than what I thought it would. Can’t wait to get our safe fixed so I can put it inside!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: its okay
customer_reviews.text: Although i haven't tested out what this item is capable of doing. I expected it have a larger capacity but it doesn't it that's why i just gave it a 3. i guess if you're looking to fit 8 1/2 x 11 items, it fits but you have to fold it to a little to insert it in the folder. May be better off looking for 11x17 size.
customer_reviews.author: jengee2

customer_reviews.title: For the price, don’t let your cash burn up
customer_reviews.text: After a fire alarm in my high rise condo building, and only thinking to grab my phone, I thought about the stack of cash I keep at home and how it would burn up in an actual fire. I don’t keep a safe anymore since my building is secure, but I do keep a few things here. Someone else in the building recommended this little bag and it seemed like cheap insurance.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Banana

customer_reviews.title: Simplicty and Effectivness
customer_reviews.text: So, it's just a bag, right? Well, actually it's a bit more than that. I like the piece of mind knowing that if anything terrible were to happen it would give me time to secure this pouch before it and it's contents were destroyed. Once you get past the reptilian feel of it this is exactly what everyone should have in their homes to protect valuable things from high heat... and to a certain extent water damage.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Weller

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, but NOT WATERPROOF
customer_reviews.text: Zipper doesn't close it all the way shut, so water WILL GET IN. Nice size though; definitely can fit all my documents inside. Just wished it was completely waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra B.

customer_reviews.title: Very Sticky
customer_reviews.text: Seems ok. It was very sticky, though, right out of the box. I work with the fire department and we don't generally see stickiness as a link to fireproof. Hopefully it works! As for the waterproof, the zipper doesn't lock, so I can't say that I have much faith in it other than it is hopefully water resistant. I am leery of putting water on it as I'm not sure if it will make it stickier, or not.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Seems durable
customer_reviews.text: This product is extremely sticky/tacky to the touch. Odd material. The zipper also does not zip all the way to the end so while it may be water resistant from a simple external splash or spill, water can still enter the bag and ruin your documents.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina C Barber

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: I have no faith this will work. Cheap import. Zipper likely will be the point of failure
customer_reviews.author: crystal city girl

customer_reviews.title: Look somewhere else. This is not what it states at all!!!
customer_reviews.text: Please run the other way! Or at least test it before you put your important papers in it. I did and everything was soaked with in a minute of floating on the water. Did not test fireproof so no clue on that . Pretty sure it will fair the same in that part also. It is DEFINITELY NOT WATERPROOF!
customer_reviews.author: Helen Cooley

customer_reviews.title: Not Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: This bag can not tote itself as waterproof and feels flimsy. Splash proof at best. The bag's shell stops water from coming in but when I ran it underwater, water got in through the zipper. I wish the zipper was waterproof and more secured to stop the water from leaking in. I took a lighter to the bag and it did not burn but the black protective coating did rub off on my hands after contact with the fire. I trust this bag for short term fires, but not for flooding.
customer_reviews.author: Aamina

customer_reviews.title: Returned!  Cannot possibly be water resistant
customer_reviews.text: There is no way this is water resistant. The gap at the zipper is huge. Sent this back.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Ideal, generously-size bag for Scouts!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a large, sturdy cash bag for our Girl Scout Troop, in preparation for cookie selling season. I am very pleased with the size and quality of this bag. I have used a small cash bag in the past, but this one is so much better. It is a generous size, yet fits perfectly in our troop tote bag. It is waterproof, has a sturdy zipper and is deep enough that is easily holds all of the bills and extra documents without risk of money falling out or exceeding bag capacity. This is ideal!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff & Tracy Stanley

customer_reviews.title: High quality with lots of room for important papers and items
customer_reviews.text: Seems highly water resistant, sturdily made so should last a long time. I cannot attest to its fire resistance since I thankfully haven’t tested that scenario, but it is excellent size and can fit many important documents and items. You can see from my picture how many 8.5x11 standard size papers I fit in it with room for more and other items as well. I’m very happy with this purchase, especially for the reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: jamie Howard

customer_reviews.title: Multiple uses, discreet and good size
customer_reviews.text: Bought a few. Use them when I work at the beach. Keeps paperwork clean and dry, They have a lot of uses, I have used them for my shoes, and other things when on the road. They do not advertise as waterproof I don’t think, I have never submerged them in water, wouldn’t try that
customer_reviews.author: Zay5775

customer_reviews.title: no fire,no rate
customer_reviews.text: Happy to say can't rate this product due to no fire. Hope I never have to rate this product.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: It's not fireproof!
customer_reviews.text: Don't trust this for ur important papers. I put the ligher just for 30 seconds from outside and see the pictures! It burned from inside! Bulshit!
customer_reviews.author: Sam nad

customer_reviews.title: I don’t think it’s water proof but it’s sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something to protect my documents and a few sentimental pieces. While I thankfully have not had to test the fireproof aspects yet, I don’t think this is water proof. The zipper does not look like it would keep water out. The fabric probably would not absorb anything, but the zipper is lacking. It’s a large, sturdy pouch so it fit everything I needed it to.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Rugg

customer_reviews.title: Convenience  and affordable
customer_reviews.text: The size fits legal size documents nicely. This enables me to place more items in it and keeping our space flatter and compact. We are planning on purchasing at least 2 more, this way we can be more organized and compact. A plus, we can get these bags quickly for travelling in case of an emergency because I can truly grab and go. We live in a high hurricane area. I would recommend these bags for convenience and compact organization. I have not submerged it in water yet.
customer_reviews.author: Kristha Carlaw

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: I liked almost everything; Exception, no locking feature. The size is perfect as I placed several labeled file folders inside, i.e., Last Will, and all pertinent final papers: Deeds, Titles, and Certificates of importance. I purchased two, one for myself and one for my son. He liked it as well but would have liked a locking feature.
customer_reviews.author: Bettie Paul

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t tested the product in a fire but I am very happy with the size. I thought it was maybe a little larger than passport size but was surprised to see how much larger it is
customer_reviews.author: Zoe's mom

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTED!
customer_reviews.text: I put water in my sink and left it ai the water for 15 min and came back and it was filled with water inside and also between the liner🎂! I live in Metairie about 7 miles from Nee Orleans and I needed to protect my papers from hurricanes and fire BERY DISAPPOINTED!
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this fire proof document and it was delivered the next day. I poured water on it and the papers stayed dry! Liquid pools and isn’t absorbed. I am very pleased with the size and how many papers can fit inside. The papers and bag were unaffected when I lit a flame under it.
customer_reviews.author: notsusan

customer_reviews.title: Bag was sticky.
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with this item first thing when i opened it. The entire case is sticky and feels awful. I did not read anywhere that it was suppose to be that way. I dont know what the stickiness is and did not even like touching it to put back in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Would look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: I hardly think this product can do what it claims. The bag feels sticky and greasy. I wouldn't put anything valuable in it.
customer_reviews.author: NikkiAM

customer_reviews.title: Not sure fireproof, but water resistant
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the fireproof claim, but so much of it is made of flammable materials I don’t think it would work. Returned. However, if I needed a water resistant doc holder I would have kept it. It seemed like it would protect docs from water, just not fire.
customer_reviews.author: helpfulmouse

customer_reviews.title: Fire/water resistant bag
customer_reviews.text: well, the reason I bought the bag was in case of a fire and/water damage. So I can't tell you if it is going to do what it is supposed to do???!!!! If, unfortunately, I have a flood or fire and everything survives I will give it 5 stars. In the mean time 4 stars will have to do
customer_reviews.author: ShopperJudi

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: It is resistant, it fits a lot of documents that I need to make sure they are safe. It is black and nice-looking, water and fire resistant as it says on the product description. Nothing to complain yet. It`s nice to know that all my documents are safe in the same place and in case of emergency they are gonna be easy to find.
customer_reviews.author: Jessika M.

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than I thought
customer_reviews.text: This bag is actually very nice. It’s big enough to fit all of small stuff and big enough for medical record size papers. With 2 children and a lot of travel.... i have somewhere to safely put my important docs. I hope I don’t have to ever test the bag but it seems tough.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: We have not had a fire (thankfully). so I cannot give a complete review and hope to never need to.
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a safe place to put our legal documents inside our safe. We found there was not room for a metal box. I saw the envelope on Amazon. I had no idea they even existed. I hope that we never have to test it in a real life situation.
customer_reviews.author: BLD

customer_reviews.title: Not Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I just got this and wanted to test it out with water. I tried it and water got right in where the zipper is. I made sure I had it pulled all the way but that did not help. The material does seem to be water proof but if water still gets in it should not be advertised as such. I did not test the fireproof component of it. But because water gets it I gave it a two star.
customer_reviews.author: Diego

customer_reviews.title: Piece of mind for protecting important documents.
customer_reviews.text: I decided to purchase a fireproof document holder after starting my business, and for legal documents. This fireproof bag holds all of documents and is a great size. It's easy to place in an inconspicuous place. The document bag is of good quantity construction.
customer_reviews.author: April's Life Is Good

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: The product came as described. The 8x11 paper fits very well there. I stored my kids birth certificates as well as passports there. The material seems durable and water resistant. The zipper works well and that is extra protection for the documents.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. CYC

customer_reviews.title: Good fireproof bag
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for a long time and it seems to be what I needed to protect my most valuable documents. I HOPE I never find out how effective it is, but seems sturdy and high quality. Solid zipper and thick material.
customer_reviews.author: Jameson

customer_reviews.title: Very roomy and sturdy !
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a much smaller bag. I should've read description closer. It is very sturdy and well made. The material is thick! It is big. I am thinking I will keep it and put letters and important documents in it. It is really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: A relieable Fireproof Document Bag
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I received this Fireproof Document Bag in 2 days. It was a real quick shipping service. I like it! Secondly, this Fireproof Document Bag looks strong and make you feel it's reliable. The material is designed with no-itchy silicone coated fiberglass fabric to resistant fire and water. I have been carried it with my documents when I travel, I feel safe, it's kind of heavy duty, I feel my documents is being protected.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Hung

customer_reviews.title: Accurate
customer_reviews.text: It is actually fire proof held a lighter to it nothing no damage nothing don’t no about water but definitely fire proff
customer_reviews.author: Mz thang

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice fireproof bag and I think it'll do the trick. It feels like high quality and seems sturdy, but it arrived with 4 strings hanging off it, coming loose. So I'm not sure what that says about the durability.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: My Vital Documents are prepared in this portable fireproof zippered bag
customer_reviews.text: After multiple trips back and forth to the house, I decided to buy this to keep this while I am on the go. A copy of my vital documents ready and printed in case I need whenever where ever I may be.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Hyland

customer_reviews.title: Nice Document Bag to hold my stuffs
customer_reviews.text: This document bag is nice for holding the important forms, papers, and other stuff. I used this bag for about a month. I find this bag is extremely useful for holding documents. Sometimes, I use it as a laptop bag when I want to bring my laptop outside for works. In addition, the bag has two layers and the out layer is made from a special material so it does not have any bad smells. Anyway, I like this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It’s good for documents I didn’t check water resistance, Hope I will never have to find out as well as about the fire resistance. But it keeps the documents together and that’s what I like
customer_reviews.author: Eva C.

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: Really thin and the zipper is just regular and thin. Not sure how protective this is. I have purchased other brands that knock this quality out of the water
customer_reviews.author: Alison Clark

customer_reviews.title: NOT A WATER PROOF AS ADVERTISED
customer_reviews.text: Thiis is not a water proof product so it will not work for your documents .
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Misleading advertising
customer_reviews.text: This is fire resistant, not proof. The outer material can resist high temps but inner material starts to deform quickly if placed on a stove. Don't depend solely on this product to save your belongings from a fire, this is just another layer of protection. 3 stars for misleading people but its not a bad product by any means.
customer_reviews.author: Tim C

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy material
customer_reviews.text: The bag is pretty sturdy and I haven’t really tried it against fire-Yet! I’m not sure about the bag being water resistant tho as water can easily penetrate through the zipper so as far as water resistance, not really! Sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I put this in my fire pit to make sure it worked. It was burnt beyond recognition. The cd and paper I put in were completely gone.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, flame resistent
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice holder for documents in my desk that I need to secure in case of a fire, such as deeds and title docs. I even tested it with a lighter and not only did it retard the flame there was no apparent damage from it either.
customer_reviews.author: Bravoking

customer_reviews.title: A Good Bag to Store Important Items
customer_reviews.text: This bag is high quality. There is sufficient space to put important items in here. The bag is obviously waterproof and I trust it to be sufficiently fire resistant. All in all it is a great purchase. The bag does have a weird smell to it though.
customer_reviews.author: Thorough Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Weird Texture
customer_reviews.text: Hoping this works. Weird texture on outside. Seems to be waterproof. I have another bag from another company that is much sturdier and heavier.
customer_reviews.author: Serious camper

customer_reviews.title: Good to have, incase of fire
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because you never know when you could need something to keep small items safe from fire. It has a nice heavy duty zipper and plenty of space to store cash small items like jewelry or other Important documents like passports or insurance cards.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: I didn’t realize how large it was.
customer_reviews.text: I forgot to take a picture of the bag but it’s larger than your standard cash bags. I use this for work purposes only. Cash, coin rolls, and deposit slips. It’s not too big or heavy so it was a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: A must have to feel safer
customer_reviews.text: I like how it looks like: contemporary and stylish. No any smell. Surprised that it is light. Hope I will not need to test it in a real life. Looks like a great quality. Great that it is also waterproof. It is always better to be on a safe side than deal with concequences.
customer_reviews.author: Mirka

customer_reviews.title: Not what i was expecting
customer_reviews.text: Although a great idea the zipper does not appear to close all the way. Which would cause a problem for keeping water out even if it keeps out the fire
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Burnett

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: Hope never to put it to the test. The overall size is just right for files. The outside coating is odd to the touch, almost sticky. Still pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LindaS

customer_reviews.title: Good Size and Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I like the size, hold documents, cash, jewels etc. A nice size but not too big or too small. A nice change from a bulky safe box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Description inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: It's like a totem bag Awful Cannot believe this is fireproof and waterproof Very thin Flimsy
customer_reviews.author: Debra Burgoon

customer_reviews.title: Helpful Thing to have
customer_reviews.text: I never thought there's a product as a fire-resistant bag, but definitely worry about losing important documents like passport. This bag can contain more than I expected. I can even put stuff that is much thicker. A plus is that it is easy to clean due to the surface is water-proof as well.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Song

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Seems high quality, but hope I never have a fire to test how fire resistant it is. Papers and everything else you would want to store fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Kadamczyk57

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: This fits a full sized paper and a decent amount of goods we like to have protected in our house. Sent my mom one also. Good find.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylynn Perez

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Nice to finally have all my important stuff in one place, I even have a cellphone in it, I put a lighter to it and it withstood the heat, I have not tried water but I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They're alright.
customer_reviews.text: Serves the purpose, a bit pricey. I will have to wait for my house to catch on fire to see if they were work!
customer_reviews.author: Flametree

customer_reviews.title: Nicely Made Product
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived in one day. It is very well made and will protect my special documents from fire and wetness. I have not tested the water resistant feature. Yes, I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Hasn't proven itself yet ...
customer_reviews.text: ... but, I trust it never has to! I wanted something to protect important papers in my file cabinet. This addressed the need.
customer_reviews.author: R. Nestor

customer_reviews.title: Five stars
customer_reviews.text: Just big enought to put a standard folder in, or a typical 8.5 x 11 paper. It's good at repelling water but fortunatly, it hasn't had any experience with fire.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: This envelope will hold 8.5 x 11.0 sized letters easily. It expands some so you can put other items in it. It feels very sturdy. Not sure if it fire or water proof since I don’t want to test it but I feel it would protect your documents.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Collins

customer_reviews.title: Great for transporting
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to keep important documents safe without a bulky safe..it even fits in my go bag if I have to leave my house quickly during emergencies.
customer_reviews.author: John Doan

customer_reviews.title: The size is right for me
customer_reviews.text: This document bag is right for me to store my important documents. Previously got a similar item which was a little bit too small. This one, 13.4”x 9.4”, is right for me.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this for several months, and it's holding up well. Obviously I haven't set it on fire or dunked it in water, but I'm hopeful it will work as it should.
customer_reviews.author: Paul G

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof, I think not.
customer_reviews.text: This product is NOT waterproof. First use everything inside got wet. Not happy about it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Naumann

customer_reviews.text: I have to say at first I was so skeptical but I got it now and I’m happy with it I even tested it out and tried to burn it and it’s true to its name it held up didn’t burn or leave a mark or anything so I’m glad I got it
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good so far
customer_reviews.text: We're just guessing that it's fireproof. To know for sure we would have to put it on fire and we will not do that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Great safety addition
customer_reviews.text: This holds more documents and paperwork than you think , it was a nice safety addition to our go bag.
customer_reviews.author: Coolmornings

customer_reviews.title: Not really “waterproof” just “water resistant”.
customer_reviews.text: Title is misleading when I bought it. I thought it was “waterproof” as in seal tight waterproof. Turns out it can just withstand getting wet.
customer_reviews.author: Martin R.

customer_reviews.title: protects as it should
customer_reviews.text: it fits the need. obviously no way to see how well it works but feel comfortable having it for important docs
customer_reviews.author: dale lattea

customer_reviews.title: a well needed product for all my offshore  documentation.
customer_reviews.text: it is a zipper pouch, but I do need something like this for my documents. I work offshore and really like this product. It would be hassle to get new documentation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good heavy material
customer_reviews.text: Havent had a flood or fire to give those reviews but its seems like good heavy material
customer_reviews.author: PaulieGirl615

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: Nice material, appears to be heavy duty. We put our important docs and cash inside, which stays inside our safe. Keeps us organized and adds a layer of protection
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Haven't put it through fire so I can't rate that part.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanna Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Nice Document bag
customer_reviews.text: It is pretty good document bag which can hold A4 paper easily especially for carrying hard copies, passport and etc. After I zipped the bag, it is also water resistance in kayaking with a phone in it. Strongly suggest it.
customer_reviews.author: Cool

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than what I thought it would be. Perfect to keep birth certificates money and important documents in to keep them safe.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Cooper

customer_reviews.title: perf er t
customer_reviews.text: My friend recommended it to me, because every year there are different sizes of wildfires raging, I think important licenses must be protected. This capacity can hold a lot of important certificate。
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Hahaha
customer_reviews.text: Hahaha challenge the makers of this product to put a document of value in one of these bags and put it under water. Not water proof...
customer_reviews.author: RSM660

customer_reviews.title: Seems well built.
customer_reviews.text: Have not set it on fire, but it looks, feels, and works nice. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Erin W.

product_meta.title: JUNDUN Fireproof Document Bags,13.4”x 9.4”Waterproof and Fireproof Money Bag,Fireproof Safe Storage Pouch with Zipper for A4 Document Holder,File,Cash and Tablet
feature_bullets: FIREPROOF & WATER RESISTANT:Fireproof document bags are made of high quality non-itchy silicone coated fiberglass which stands up the temperature up to 1832℉（1000℃）.It will keep your values 100% safe .Document holder is not only fireproof but also high water resistant in case it gets wet for any reason

ULTRA SAFE PROTECTION:With the large capacity of 13.4 * 9.4 inches, fireproof document bag can keep most of your most valuable items including passports, licenses, USBs disks and CDs deeds, certificates, cash, letters , precious photos,marriage certificate, money and more

ZIPPER CLOSURE PROTECTION:Fireproof zipper adds storage security and carrying safety .Money bag with zipper is ideal for office or home .Combining a fireproof bag and fireproof safe box together is the best solution to offer your documents and valuables a complete protection in any fire accident

CASUAL DESIGN FOR DAILY LIFE - with a hanging trap, fireproof money pouch is convenient accessory for you no matter at home or on office, portable and can be easily folded, you can use it anytime and anywhere
TRUSTED AFTER SALES SERVICE :Ready to respond within a 24 hour time ,2 years after sales service.If you have any issue ,you will get the replacement or a full refund
